nodes.text: Chief Librarian, also known as Lead Archivist, Jedi Archivist or Master Archivist, was a title held by the member of the Jedi Order who oversaw the vast Jedi Temple archives and Holocron Vault on Coruscant. The position was once held by Restelly Quist. Around the time of the Clone Wars, the Chief Librarian was the Jedi Master Jocasta Nu. During her tenure, Nu was addressed as "Madame Librarian."
